#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int n,m,i,x=0,j,a[101][101];
	char s[101];
	while(scanf("%d%d",&n,&m)){
		if(n==0&&m==0)
			break;
		cin.ignore(1);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>s;
			for(j=0;j<m;j++){
				if(s[j]=='*')
					a[i][j]=-1;
				else a[i][j]=0;
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0;j<m;j++){
				if(a[i][j]==-1){
					if(i!=0&&j!=0&&a[i-1][j-1]!=-1)
						a[i-1][j-1]++;
					if(j!=0&&a[i][j-1]!=-1)
						a[i][j-1]++;
					if(i!=0&&a[i-1][j]!=-1)
						a[i-1][j]++;
					if(i!=n&&j!=0&&a[i+1][j-1]!=-1)
						a[i+1][j-1]++;
					if(i!=n&&a[i+1][j]!=-1)
						a[i+1][j]++;
					if(i!=0&&j!=n&&a[i-1][j+1]!=-1)
						a[i-1][j+1]++;
					if(j!=n&&a[i][j+1]!=-1)
						a[i][j+1]++;
					if(i!=n&&j!=n&&a[i+1][j+1]!=-1)
						a[i+1][j+1]++;
				}
			}
		}
		x++;
		printf("Field #%d:\n",x);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			for(j=0;j<m;j++){
				if(a[i][j]==-1)
					printf("*");
				else
				printf("%d",a[i][j]);
			}
			printf("\n");
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
}
